The Predacon strike team was nearing the Silver Wing air space, yet
they se=
nsed something was wrong there. Normally, had they detected
them, the Maxim=
als should have been coming along now,but nothing of
that happened. True, M=
otherload's ECM suite was powerful enough to
mask them, but Jotunn figured =
something else was going.

Jotunn: Gunrain, I need a quick survey of Relay.=
 Scout ahead, but do
not engage yet.

Gunrain: Aww, not even a missile, bos=
s?

Jotunn: Nothing, or I rip your motherboard and fry it before I toss
you=
r empty hulk to the Minions. Understood?

Gunrain: Uh... Sir, yeas, Sir!

H=
e boosted towards the city at ludicrous speed, activating his long
range ra=
dar as he did. In less time than it took to say it, he had a
complete surve=
y of the fighting going on. He headed back to the main
formation.

Gunrain:=
 Wow, Ma Lord! You didn't tell us there was Wave 1 an' a ha'f!
Wooeeh! Thos=
e maxis are really gettin' spanked!

He transmitted the data to the others =
in the squadron.

Jotunn: I didn't tell you because there is no such thing.=
 That is not
one of us. Does any of you recognize this thing?

Lock-on: It =
doesn'T look Minion, but something older... Decepticon
perhaps...

Jotunn: =
Let's find out. You! [He pointed to one of the escorts] Go to
that huge rob=
ot and tell him I want to know who he is and what is his
allegiance.

The e=
scort left...
